column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Kay - fon says : " This young person is the Avatar ! "
#Text=Senlin Village leader says : " So , the rumors of your return are true !
#Text=So ... is there something I can help you with ?
#Text=" Senlin Village leader says : " I 'm not sure ... " Kay - fon says : " Our village is in crisis , he 's our only hope !
#Text=For the last few days at sunset , a spirit monster comes and attacks our village .
#Text=He is Hei Bai , the black and white spirit .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Why is it attacking you ?
#Text=" Senlin Village leader says : " We do not know , but each of the last three nights , he has abducted one of our own .
#Text=We are especially fearful because the winter solstice draws near .
#Text=" Katara says : " What happens then ?
#Text=" Kay - fon says : " As the solstice approaches , the natural world and the Spirit World grow closer and closer until the line between them is blurred completely .
#Text=" Senlin Village leader says : " Hei Bai is already causing devastation and destruction .
#Text=Once the solstice is here , there 's no telling what will happen .
#Text=" Aang says : " So , what do you want me to do , exactly ?
#Text=" Kay - fon says : " Who better to resolve a crisis between our world and the Spirit World than the Avatar himself ?
#Text=You are the great bridge between man and spirits .
#Text=" Aang says : " Right ... that 's me .
#Text=" Katara says : " Hey great bridge guy , could I talk to you over here for a second ?
#Text=Aang , you seem a little unsure about all of this .
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah , that might be because I do n't know anything at all about the Spirit World .
#Text=It 's not like there 's someone to teach me this stuff !
#Text=" Katara says : " So ... can you help these people ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I have to try , do n't I ?
#Text=Maybe whatever I have to do will just ... come to me .
#Text=" Katara says : " I think you can do it , Aang .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah .
#Text=We 're all going to get eaten by a spirit monster .
#Text="
